I downloaded this and unrared it after watching this episode on TV. Even though it is rared, it is still very real and absolutely NOT fake.

Notes defending a few points made by other comments:
Sceneline releases are rared and include a sfv (checksum) file for your protection so you know the share has not been modified throughout its trip from the DVR to you.

Sceneline uses a technique, built into many torrent clients, called "super-seeding" (or initial seeding) which minimizes the load on the original seed and creates multiple seeds more quickly.

After watching this episode on TV, I downloaded this  and unrared it. It is definitely the real episode and NOT fake.

Notes about some other comments:
Sceneline releases are rared and include a sfv (checksum) file for your benefit so you know the realese has not been modified during its trip from the DVR to you; other than trimming commercials of course.

Sceneline uses a technique, included in many torrent clients, called "super-seeding" (or initial seeding) which reduces the load on the original seed and creates multiple seeds more quickly and efficiently than normal seeding.
